from TBL_COMPANYINFO where SITEID=#{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ORGID=#{ORGID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ALIASFLAG=0

mapper.update:
update TBL_COMPANYINFO
SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORGID = #{ORGID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANYNAME = #{COMPANYNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPENGNAME = #{COMPENGNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPCREDITCODE = #{COMPCREDITCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPTYPE = #{COMPTYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYADDRESS = #{COMPANYADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYPHONE = #{COMPANYPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYFAX = #{COMPANYFAX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYWEBSITE = #{COMPANYWEBSITE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYEMAIL = #{COMPANYEMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{POSTCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYCLASSID = #{COMPANYCLASSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASSIFICATION = #{CLASSIFICATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY = #{SUMMARY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYLATITUDE = #{COMPANYLATITUDE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANYLONGITUDE = #{COMPANYLONGITUDE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANYPIC = #{COMPANYPIC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUBLISHFLAG = #{PUBLISHFLAG,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEDATE = #{CREATEDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEDATE = #{UPDATEDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{CREATEUSER,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPSHORTNAME = #{COMPSHORTNAME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPCODE = #{COMPCODE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEGAL = #{LEGAL,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ALIASFLAG = #{ALIASFLAG,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_COMPANYINFO set SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGID = #{ORGID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANYNAME = #{COMPANYNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPENGNAME = #{COMPENGNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPCREDITCODE = #{COMPCREDITCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPTYPE = #{COMPTYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYADDRESS = #{COMPANYADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYPHONE = #{COMPANYPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYFAX = #{COMPANYFAX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYWEBSITE = #{COMPANYWEBSITE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYEMAIL = #{COMPANYEMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{POSTCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYCLASSID = #{COMPANYCLASSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASSIFICATION = #{CLASSIFICATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY = #{SUMMARY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYLATITUDE = #{COMPANYLATITUDE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANYLONGITUDE = #{COMPANYLONGITUDE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANYPIC = #{COMPANYPIC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISHFLAG = #{PUBLISHFLAG,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEDATE = #{CREATEDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEDATE = #{UPDATEDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROVINCE = #{PROVINCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{CITY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE = #{ZONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN = #{TOWN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE = #{VILLAGE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{COUNTRY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MPHONE = #{MPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZPHONE = #{BIZPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTOR = #{CONTACTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMSITEID = #{SAMSITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANYLEVEL = #{COMPANYLEVEL,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QQ = #{QQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN = #{WEIXIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIBO = #{WEIBO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSER = #{CREATEUSER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPSHORTNAME = #{COMPSHORTNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPCODE = #{COMPCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL = #{LEGAL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALIASFLAG = #{ALIASFLAG,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_COMPANYINFO set COMPANYWEBSITE = #{COMPANYWEBSITE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYEMAIL = #{COMPANYEMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{QQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN = #{WEIXIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIBO = #{WEIBO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MPHONE = #{MPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZPHONE = #{BIZPHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYLEVEL = #{COMPANYLEVEL,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(id) from TBL_COMPANYINFO t where 1=1
and t.town like CONCAT(CONCAT( '',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and t.companyname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and t.samsiteid = #{samsiteid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select t.SITEID from tbl_companyinfo t where t.village=#{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.samsiteid=4592
